entry.title: homepage
entry.content:
About me

Hanyi Wu (Âê¥ÁÄöÈÄ∏) is currently pursuing his MSc at Beijing Normal University. He is interested in health risk assessment and agricultural remote sensing. He developed remote sensing approaches combined with machine learning in order to characterize forms of cities not only at large scales but also a spatially-explicit resolution close to people's living environment to understand health. Prof. Yaozhong Pan is my supervisor.

Date of birth : 2000-10-29

Native place : Nanan, Fujian, China

Website : https://ross-wu-creat.github.io/

E-mail : hanyi.wu@mail.bnu.edu.cn; hanyi.wu@qq.com

Education

DegreeInstitutionMajorPeriod
MScBeijing Normal University (BNU)Cartography and GIS2022-
BScNanjing University of Information Science & Technology (NUIST)Remote sensing2018-2022

Award and honors

Time
Award
2023School Merit Student (BNU)
2022Outstanding Graduate Student of Jiangsu Province (Jiangsu)
2021Merit Student of Jiangsu Province (Jiangsu)
2021 & 2020 & 2019School Merit Student (NUIST)
2020 & 2019 School Excellent Student Cadre (NUIST)
2018 School Outstanding Student (NUIST)
Time
Scholarship
2023First Prize of Academic Scholarship (BNU)
2022First Prize of Academic Scholarship (NUIST)
2021National Scholarship (NUIST)
2020 & 2021Principal's Scholarship (NUIST)
2019National Encouragement Scholarship (NUIST)
Time
Prize
2021Second Prize of Sharing Cup Innovation Competition of Science and Technology Resources Sharing Service (National)
2021Honorable Mention of Mathematical Contest In Modeling (MCM/ICM)
2020Second Prize of Asia and Pacific Mathematical Contest in Modeling (APMCM)
2020Third Prize of China Undergraduate Mathematical Contest in Model (CUMCM)
2020Third Prize of Lan Qiao Cup National Software and information technology professionals competition (Python Programming) (National)
2020Third Prize of Chinese Mathematics Competitions (CMC) (National)

Research interest

Research interest
Include
Health Risk Assessmentheat health risk assesment, human exposure, environmental justice, etc.
Agricultural Remote Sensingcrop mapping (especially early and in-season large-scale mapping), timeseries satellite data reconstruction in agricultural scenarios, phenology extraction, soil erosion and agricultural sustainability, etc.

Scientific publications

2024

  1. Hanyi Wu, Yongming Xu*, Min Zhang, Lingbo Su, Yiqi Wang, Shanyou Zhu. (2024). Spatially explicit assessment of the heat-related health risk in the Yangtze River Delta, China, using multisource remote sensing and socioeconomic data. Sustainable Cities and Society, 104, 105300. (SCI-Q1, TOP, IF = 11.7) üîó
  2. Hanyi Wu, Chuanwu Zhao, Yu Zhu, Yaozhong Pan*. (2024). A multiscale examination of heat health risk inequality and its drivers in mega-urban agglomeration: A case study in the Yangtze River Delta, China. Journal of Cleaner Production, 142528. (SCI-Q1, TOP, IF = 11.1) üîó
  3. Hanyi Wu, Yaozhong Pan*, Yuan Gao, Decai Jin, Chuanwu Zhao, Shoujia Ren. (2024). Improving sample applicability for early-season mapping of winter wheat using geoclimatic zoning. 2024 IEEE International Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium, Athens, Greece. (Conference) üîó
  4. Chuanwu Zhao, Yaozhong Pan*, Shoujia Ren, Yuan Gao, Hanyi Wu, Gelilan Ma. (2024). Accurate vegetation destruction detection using remote sensing imagery based on the three-band difference vegetation index (TBDVI) and dual-temporal detection method. International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation, 127, 103669. (SCI-Q1, TOP, IF = 7.5) üîó
  5. Yu Zhu, Yaozhong Pan*, Dujuan Zhang, Hanyi Wu, Chuanwu Zhao. (2024). A deep learning method for cultivated land parcels (CLPs) delineation from high-resolution remote sensing images with high-generalization capability. IEEE Transactions on Geoscience and Remote Sensing. (SCI-Q1, TOP, IF = 7.6) üîó
  6. Chuanwu Zhao, Yaozhong Pan*, Hanyi Wu, Shoujia Ren, Gelilan Ma, Yuan Gao, Yu Zhu, Guifei Jing. (2024). A Novel Spectral Index for Vegetation Destruction Event Detection Based on Multispectral Remote Sensing Imagery. IEEE Journal of Selected Topics in Applied Earth Observations and Remote Sensing. (SCI-Q1, TOP, IF = 5) üîó
  7. Yiqi Wang, Yongming Xu*, Xichen Xu, Xingan Jiang, Yaping Mo, Hengrui Cui, Shanyou Zhu, Hanyi Wu. (2024). Evaluation of six global high-resolution global land cover products over China. International Journal of Digital Earth, 17, 2301673. (SCI-Q1, TOP, IF = 5.1) üîó

2023

  1. Hanyi Wu, Junfeng Xiong*, Xuan Hou, Chen Lin, Jinduo Xu, Ronghua Ma. (2023). A dataset of soil water erosion of Northeast China from 2001 to 2020. China Scientific Data, 8(4). (‰∏≠ÊñáÊ†∏ÂøÉ, CSCD) üîóüíº

  3. Chuanwu Zhao*, Yaozhong Pan*, Hanyi Wu, Yu Zhu. (2023). Quantifying the contribution of industrial zones to urban heat islands: Relevance and direct impact. Environmental Research, 240, 117594. (SCI-Q1, TOP, IF = 8.3) üîó
